title: TALON PV to Supply TRINA Solar with High-Efficiency TOPCon Solar Cells Beginning in 2026
body:
HOUSTON, Feb. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TALON PV , a leading innovator in high-efficiency photovoltaic technology, is pleased to announce a strategic
multi-GW, long-term supply agreement with TRINA Solar , one of the world's foremost solar module manufacturers. Under this collaboration, TALON PV will supply TRINA Solar with state-of-the-art N-type solar cells, commencing in the first half of 2026.
  This partnership marks a significant achievement for both companies, underscoring their mutual commitment to advancing the global transition to clean energy through high-performance solar solutions. The integration of TALON PV's high-efficiency TOPCon solar cells into TRINA Solar's advanced module technologies will further enhance module efficiency and value for our domestic customers.
  Both TALON PV's solar cells and TRINA Solar's modules are proudly manufactured in the United States, reflecting the companies' strong dedication to domestic production. By prioritizing U.S.-based manufacturing, this collaboration supports local job creation, fortifies the domestic solar supply chain, and strengthens the nation's renewable energy infrastructure. Furthermore, customers investing in these American-made products will benefit from domestic content tax incentives, further enhancing the financial viability of domestically produced PV modules.
  "We are excited to collaborate with TRINA Solar, a global leader in solar technology," stated Adam Tesanovich, CEO of TALON PV. "Our TOPCon technology is designed to push the limits of efficiency and reliability, and we are confident that this partnership will accelerate the use of domestically produced, high-efficiency modules."
  Through this agreement, TALON PV will leverage its cutting-edge manufacturing expertise to deliver high-quality solar cells that align with TRINA Solar's mission to provide cost-effective and sustainable energy solutions. This partnership further highlights the industry's growing emphasis on next-generation solar technologies, which are essential for optimizing energy generation and reducing the overall cost of solar power.
  "We are eager to integrate TALON PV's TOPCon technology into our high-efficiency solar modules," said Steve Liang, VP Operations at TRINA Solar. "This collaboration demonstrates our continued efforts to enhance our product offerings and deliver the most advanced solar solutions to our customers."
  About TALON PV
  Talon PV is a U.S.-based high-tech manufacturer specializing in N-type photovoltaic (PV) cell production, dedicated to advancing high-efficiency cell technology. Talon's U.S.-based N-type TOPCon cell manufacturing facility is scheduled to commence operations in the first quarter of 2026, adding a total of 4 gigawatts (GW) of annual American c-Si solar cell production capacity by first quarter of 2027. In addition to its core manufacturing operations, Talon PV places a strong emphasis on research and development, continuously innovating and developing intellectual property to drive future advancements in cell processing. The company employs state-of-the-art American and Western equipment and integrates cutting-edge technology, such as LECO, to achieve industry-leading efficiency. Operating under novel intellectual property licenses, the company maintains world-class production facilities and implements a rigorous quality control system to guarantee that each cell meets the highest industry standards. Additional capacity expansion beyond 4 gigawatts (GW) planned in late 2028.
  About TRINA Solar
  TRINA Solar is a globally recognized leader in the solar industry, known for its high-quality photovoltaic modules and comprehensive smart energy solutions. Since its founding in 1997, TRINA Solar has been at the forefront of solar innovation, continuously advancing solar technology to enhance energy efficiency and sustainability. The company's mission is to foster a carbon-free world by delivering reliable and cost-effective solar solutions worldwide.
  View original content to download multimedia: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/talon-pv-to-supply-trina-solar-with-high-efficiency-topcon-solar-cells-beginning-in-2026-302382592.html
  SOURCE Talon PV
